name: Portfolio
tagline: Quick Links for all my Stuff!
body: ## About These are my projects from my time at school and beyond. You can email me at JohnCeceriTheThird@gmail.com You can see my website at [jciii.me](JCIII.me) ###The Garden Trailer Horror game in a 3D environment based on “The Garden of Earthly Delights“ by renaissance painter Hieronymus Bosch. Role was to help architect and program the gameplay system in Unity 5, and then implement puzzles for proof-of-concept demo. Puzzle building consisted of coding systems and adding content from the writers. (Worked on at MAGIC Spell Studios) Will be featured at The 8th International Conference on Interactive Digital Storytelling Art Exhibition, Copenhagen, Denmark from Nov. 30-Dec 4, 2015. ###Spirit of Rochester Web Game Educational point-and-click adventure game to teach kids about the history of Rochester New York. Role was to build a game engine using HTML5 and JavaScript, and use XML to make a system easy for designers for continued extension. (Worked on at MAGIC Spell Studios) ###Can I Haz Monsters? LD33 Page Game made in 72 hours in Unity for Ludum Dare 33, with the theme "You are the monster." Ranked 16th for innovation and 105th overall. Came up with the concept and co-programmed and co-designed with [Omiya Games](http://omiyagames.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
